attributes.action: Seek Royal Patronage for Wootten Bassett in gratitude for its respect to HM Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the people of Wootten Bassett have regulary performed the duties of Royalty and our so called politicians by welcoming home the bodies of our servicemen and women with dignity and respect and have represented the nations sympathy with modesty, this country should repay their loyalty to the crown and its armed forces by granting Royal Patronage upon the town and rename it Royal Wootten Bassett.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to seek Royal Patronage for Wootten Bassett in gratitude for its respect to HM Forces.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Wootten


Her Majesty's Government
